techmeme.title: Etched, which is building Sohu, an inferencing chip that only runs transformer AI models, raised a $120M Series A, bringing its total funding to $125.36M (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Uber Freight will use Aurora's driverless trucks on routes between Dallas and Houston as part of a new long-term deal, following a three-year commercial pilot (Andrew J. Hawkins/The Verge)
Sources: Meituan considers raising $1B+ via a bond offering this year as the food delivery and shopping platform seeks to repay some debt and fund its expansion (Bloomberg)
EvolutionaryScale releases AI models called ESM3 to create novel proteins and raised $142M in seed funding led by Nat Friedman, Daniel Gross, and Lux Capital (Reuters)
In preliminary findings, the EU charges Microsoft with antitrust violations over concerns that it gave Teams an "undue advantage" by bundling it with Office (Javier Espinoza/Financial Times)
